metadata.title: CVE-2023-37767 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: GPAC v2.3-DEV-rev381-g817a848f6-master was discovered to contain asegmentation violation in the BM_ParseIndexValueReplace function at/lib/libgpac.so.

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
